posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
look at these two joe jacksons... quite different...

one has the strong red lips... the other doesn't.
the jersey button area on one is much wider than the other.
the jersey has buttons on one, the other doesn't.

They are both graded by SGC... are they both real? I've never seen two vary this much before
